hero.title: Support doctors, not replace them.
hero.subtitle: Your intelligent co-pilot for clinical reasoning. DXLY helps clinicians move from symptoms to clarity with AI-assisted insights. By analyzing patterns, surfacing possibilities, and providing evidence-based differentials, DXLY empowers doctors to make faster, more confident decisions — without losing the human touch.

1.title: Faster differentials
1.description: Instantly see likely diagnoses based on patient symptoms.

2.title: AI-powered reasoning
2.description: Trained on trusted clinical data, built for interpretability.

3.title: Human-in-the-loop
3.description: Every insight is designed to assist, not automate, your judgment.

4.title: Privacy-first

sidebar.title: Navigation Sidebar
sidebar.content: Use this sidebar to navigate between all pages in the app. Access your dashboard, patients, visits, and settings from anywhere.

patients.title: Patients
patients.content: View and manage all your patients. Add new patients, search by name or PESEL, and access patient records.

visits.title: Visits
visits.content: Manage your appointments and consultations. Create new visits, record symptoms, add diagnoses, and generate AI-powered notes.

settings.title: Settings
settings.content: Customize your profile, update your information, change language preferences, and manage your account settings.

upcomingVisits.title: Upcoming Visits
upcomingVisits.content: See your scheduled appointments at a glance. Quickly access visit details and prepare for upcoming consultations.

language.title: Language
language.content: Switch between English and Polish to use the app in your preferred language.

patientVisits.title: My Visits
patientVisits.content: View all your appointments here. You can see upcoming and past visits, and add symptoms before your consultation.

patientUpcoming.title: Upcoming Visits
patientUpcoming.content: See your upcoming appointments at a glance. You can add symptoms before your visit to help your doctor prepare.
